name: Ninja Toy - World Hero
description:
A tiny alien race is looking to
conquer earth. In order to do 
that, they must learn everything 
related to human culture first.

The flemingans always leave their
TV on when they're out.
The aliens know this and appear
at their house every time they
leave, to watch the news.

You're the only "thing" in the
entire world that knows about this,
and you are an alive toy ninja.

This calls for action!
now, nip this in the bud!

If you want to support me you can also do that by clicking on the following button :)
